title: Over the Top
description: From bestselling author, Dr. Rebecca Sharp, comes a sexy, winter sports romance with a flurry of suspense that will heat up the slopes and keep you on your toes ...They call Jac Blanchard the ice princess of the mountain. Broken and betrayed by her fiancé, Jac learned the hard way not to care about anything except her career. Especially not men.One night with Kyle Masters was only supposed to be a distraction before the Alpine Ski World Cup. But she can’t stop thinking about the aggravatingly attractive prince charming. He wants to be her white knight, but Jac knows it’s safer to not need saving.Kyle knows what he wants when he sees it, and after one night with Jac—all he can see is her. What they have deserves more than a fling, but Jac is determined to hide her warm heart behind a frozen shield.Kyle won’t give up on his stubborn Cinderella, especially when she can’t help but melt under his touch. And when danger lurks on the mountain, he’ll fight to keep her safe—even if it costs him everything.
author: Rebecca  Sharp
